languages.text: "Речи ваших врагов, мон-кай, звучат так же, как и ваши собственные. Фанатично, составленные из одних лишь ярости и презрения. Неужели даже это не заставляет вас задуматься?"
"The speeches of your enemies, mon-keigh, sound just like your own. Fanatical, composed of nothing but rage and contempt. Is even that not enough to make you wonder?"
languages.original_text: "Речи ваших врагов, мон-кай, звучат так же, как и ваши собственные. Фанатично, составленные из одних лишь ярости и презрения. Неужели даже это не заставляет вас задуматься?"

traits.locale_text: "The speeches of your enemies, mon-keigh, sound just like your own. Fanatical, composed of nothing but rage and contempt. Is even that not enough to make you wonder?"
"The speeches of your enemies, mon-keigh, sound just like your own. Fanatical, composed of nothing but rage and contempt. Is even that not enough to make you wonder?"
"The speeches of your enemies, mon-keigh, sound just like your own. Fanatical, composed of nothing but rage and contempt. Is even that not enough to make you wonder?"
"The speeches of your enemies, mon-keigh, sound just like your own. Fanatical, composed of nothing but rage and contempt. Is even that not enough to make you wonder?"
"The speeches of your enemies, mon-keigh, sound just like your own. Fanatical, composed of nothing but rage and contempt. Is even that not enough to make you wonder?"
"The speeches of your enemies, mon-keigh, sound just like your own. Fanatical, composed of nothing but rage and contempt. Is even that not enough to make you wonder?"

languages.text: « Votre discours ressemble dangereusement à celui de vos ennemis, mon-keigh. Ce ne sont que divagations fanatiques ancrées dans la rage et le mépris. Et malgré tout, vous ne vous remettez jamais en question ? »
languages.original_text: "The speeches of your enemies, mon-keigh, sound just like your own. Fanatical, composed of nothing but rage and contempt. Is even that not enough to make you wonder?"

traits.locale_text: « Votre discours ressemble dangereusement à celui de vos ennemis, mon-keigh. Ce ne sont que divagations fanatiques ancrées dans la rage et le mépris. Et malgré tout, vous ne vous remettez jamais en question ? »

languages.text: «Los discursos de sus enemigos, mon-keigh, suenan igual que los suyos. Llenos de fanatismo, rabia y desprecio. ¿No basta con eso para hacer que dude?».
languages.original_text: "The speeches of your enemies, mon-keigh, sound just like your own. Fanatical, composed of nothing but rage and contempt. Is even that not enough to make you wonder?"

traits.locale_text: «Los discursos de sus enemigos, mon-keigh, suenan igual que los suyos. Llenos de fanatismo, rabia y desprecio. ¿No basta con eso para hacer que dude?».

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイ、敵の演説はお前自身のものと同じように聞こえている。狂信的で、怒りと軽蔑だけで構成されている。それさえも不思議に思わないのか？」
languages.original_text: "The speeches of your enemies, mon-keigh, sound just like your own. Fanatical, composed of nothing but rage and contempt. Is even that not enough to make you wonder?"

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイ、敵の演説はお前自身のものと同じように聞こえている。狂信的で、怒りと軽蔑だけで構成されている。それさえも不思議に思わないのか？」

languages.text: “听听你的敌人是怎么说的吧，猴子。这就像你平时说的话一样，充满了狂热、愤怒与蔑视，难道这还不足以让你自省吗？”
languages.original_text: "The speeches of your enemies, mon-keigh, sound just like your own. Fanatical, composed of nothing but rage and contempt. Is even that not enough to make you wonder?"

traits.locale_text: “听听你的敌人是怎么说的吧，猴子。这就像你平时说的话一样，充满了狂热、愤怒与蔑视，难道这还不足以让你自省吗？”

languages.text: "Die Worte Eurer Feinde, Chem-Pan-Sey, gleichen den Euren. Fanatisch, allein von Wut und Verachtung getrieben. Reicht selbst das nicht aus, um Euch nachdenklich zu machen?"
languages.original_text: "The speeches of your enemies, mon-keigh, sound just like your own. Fanatical, composed of nothing but rage and contempt. Is even that not enough to make you wonder?"

traits.locale_text: "Die Worte Eurer Feinde, Chem-Pan-Sey, gleichen den Euren. Fanatisch, allein von Wut und Verachtung getrieben. Reicht selbst das nicht aus, um Euch nachdenklich zu machen?"

languages.text: "Mon-keigh, düşmanlarının konuşmaları seninkini andırıyor. Hepsi fanatik, içlerinde öfke ve horgörüden başka hiçbir şey barınmıyor. Sırf bu bile sende merak hissi uyandırmıyor mu?"
languages.original_text: "The speeches of your enemies, mon-keigh, sound just like your own. Fanatical, composed of nothing but rage and contempt. Is even that not enough to make you wonder?"
